|cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu2_brand=Atheros |cpu2_model=AR9344;AR9344-BC2A, PKS787.002B, 1306, TAIWAN;; |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S70FL256P0XMFI00 |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G63JFR-Y5C |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=SK hynix |ram2_model=H5PS5162GFR-Y5C |ram2_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, dual,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344;AR9344-BC2A, PKS787.002B, 1306, TAIWAN;; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Pegatron UPWL6580 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9580;AR9580-AR1A, PNF488.003C, 1301, KOREA; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A;AR8035-A, SJ8K4.3D, 1239 CN; |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327;AR8327-AL1A, E4U375.3B, 1305, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2598L;SiGe, 2598L, 245BD;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L;SiGe, 5003L, 240FL;3; ,,, Digital Cable Front-End Receiver;MaxLinear;MxL261;MxL, MXL261, SR3H6.16, 1307 00;1; ,,, Cable Modem Power Amplifier;Maxim;MAX3520;;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.2.0; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "ACM6234" and "REV: 3.11" is silkscreened on the board in the photos below. :This probably indicates ''[[Pegatron]]'' (''[[ASUS]]'') board manufacture
This device is a ''[[Netgear]]'' CG4000TD (VMDG485) distributed :by ''{{Used by service|Virgin Media}}'' within Europe (''UK'' only?).
DOCSIS 3.0 8x4 (8-downstream, 4-upstream)<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }}
===Wikis=== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/inbox/toh/virgin.media.superhub.2 ''Virgin Media Super Hub 2 - VMDG485/CG4000TD'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.usbjtag.com/vbforum/showthread.php?t=8603 ''Netgear CG4000TD'' on '''USB JTAG''' forums] (w/ P5 SoC boot log) *[http://cable-wizardz.co.uk/topic/5787-vmdg485-any-ideas/ ''VMDG485, Any Ideas?'' on '''Cable-Wizardz''' forums] (w/ images)<!--[req. forum acct.]-->
===Teardown=== *[https://www.experimental-engineering.co.uk/virgin-media-superhub-2-teardown/ ''Virgin Media Superhub 2 Teardown'' on '''Experimental Engineering'''] *[http://electronics360.globalspec.com/article/3410/netgear-super-hub-2-vmdg485-wireless-router-teardown ''Netgear Super Hub 2 VMDG485 Teardown on '''Electronics360'''] :CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] TNETC4830ZDWGU - DOCSIS 3.0 8x4 <!-- *TEXAS INSTRUMENTS TNETC4830ZDWGU Cable Modem IC - DOCSIS 3.0, 8-Channel 320Mbps Downstream, :4-Channel 160Mbps Upstream- (Qty: 1) *QUALCOMM ATHEROS AR9344-BC2A WLAN SoC - 802.11n, 2.4/5GHz, 2x2 MIMO, MIPS 74Kc Processor, :5-Port 10/100 Ethernet Switch- (Qty: 1) *PEGATRON UPWL6580 WLAN Half Mini PCIe Module - 802.11a/n, 5GHz, 3x3 MIMO, Qualcomm Atheros AR9580-AR1A (Qty: 1) *QUALCOMM ATHEROS AR8035-A Ethernet Transceiver - Single-Port, 10/100/1000 Base-T- (Qty: 1) *QUALCOMM ATHEROS AR8327-BL1A Ethernet Switch - 7-Port, 10/100/1000BASE-T- (Qty: 1) *SPANSION S70FL256P0XMFI00 Flash - NOR, 256Mb, 3V, 104MHz, SPI (Qty: 1) *SK HYNIX H5PS5162GFR-Y5C SDRAM - DDR2, 512Mb, 1.8V, 3ns- (Qty: 2) *MAXLINEAR MXL261 Tuner / Demodulator - 2 100MHz Wideband Tuners, 4 QAM Demodulators, :4-Channel Wide IF Output, w/ Intergrated Splitter- (Qty: 1) *BOTHHAND G2PM109N LF Ethernet Magnetics Module - 100/1000 BASE-T, Dual-Port- (Qty: 2) :T-MAC TECHVEST PCB CO., LTD. 4-Layer - FR4, Lead-Free- (Qty: 1) --> *[http://blog.liang.tw/wp-content/uploads/file_uploads/250GB/PEGA/%e5%b7%a5%e4%bd%9c%20%e8%b3%87%e6%96%99/Project%20Introduction_v0.5.pptx ''Powerpoint presentation'' w/ market info @ '''blog.liang.tw''']
==Images== <gallery caption="internal + PSU"> File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips6.jpg|Puma 5 SoC File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips5.jpg|AR9580 module File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips4.jpg|GbE switch File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips3.jpg|Tuner File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips2.jpg|AR9344 RF File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips.jpg|AR9344 + RAM File:Netgear_vmdg_485_lq_psu.jpg|Power supply </gallery>{{#set:Has images=internal|Has images=power supply}}
